name: ChemSpace
description: ChemSpace offers an AI-powered compound database and virtual screening platform for efficient hit discovery and lead optimization in drug development.

name: DeepChem
description: DeepChem is an open-source deep learning library that accelerates drug discovery, molecular property prediction, and quantum chemistry modeling.

name: IBM RXN for Chemistry
description: IBM RXN is a cloud-based AI tool for retrosynthesis planning, reaction prediction, and fully automated synthetic route generation for chemists.

name: MoleculeNet
description: MoleculeNet provides benchmark datasets, tools, and metrics to accelerate molecular machine learning research.

name: Mol2Vec
description: Mol2Vec applies natural language processing techniques to molecules to generate vector representations for cheminformatics tasks.

name: Chemprop
description: Chemprop is a message-passing neural network framework for molecular property prediction.

name: Alchemy
description: Alchemy is a Microsoft AI platform focusing on chemical data and reaction prediction.

name: RDKit
description: RDKit is an open-source cheminformatics software for working with chemical informatics and machine learning.

name: AutoDock
description: AutoDock is a molecular modeling simulation software for docking small molecules to receptors.

name: ChemTS
description: ChemTS is a Python library for de novo molecular generation using machine learning techniques.

name: MolGAN
description: MolGAN is a generative adversarial network for small molecular graphs generation.

name: ChemBERTa
description: ChemBERTa is a transformer-based model for molecular property prediction and representation learning.

name: Chematica
description: Chematica is a synthetic planning software that designs chemical synthesis routes using AI.

name: ChemTS
description: ChemTS is a Python library for de novo molecular generation using machine learning techniques.

name: MolNetEnhancer
description: MolNetEnhancer integrates molecular networking and cheminformatics for enhanced chemical annotation.

name: ChemDataExtractor
description: ChemDataExtractor is a toolkit for automated extraction of chemical information from scientific documents.

name: DeepChemistry
description: DeepChemistry leverages AI and machine learning for chemical reaction prediction and molecular design.

name: MolSSI
description: The Molecular Sciences Software Institute supports open-source software for molecular sciences.

name: ChemRxiv
description: ChemRxiv is a free preprint server for chemistry research, accelerating scientific communication.

name: PubChem
description: PubChem is a public repository for chemical molecules and their activities, widely used in cheminformatics.

name: ChEMBL
description: ChEMBL is a manually curated chemical database of bioactive molecules with drug-like properties.
